title: The British treaty [microform] : with an appendix of state papers; which are now first published
creator: Brown, Charles Brockden, 1771-1810
Morris, Gouverneur, 1752-1816
description: "To those members of Congress who have the sense to perceive and the spirit to pursue the true interests of their country, this pamphlet is dedicated"--p. [3]
Attributed to Charles Brockden Brown--National Union Catalog pre-1956 imprints. Another edition (1808; CIHM microfiche no. 11986) has statement of responsibility "by Gouverneur Morris."
Concerns the treaty of commerce and navigation signed at London, December 1806, by Pinkney and Monroe, but refused ratification by President Jefferson, without consultation of the Senate
Filmed from a copy of the original publication held by the University of Saskatchewan, Saskatoon
publisher: [London] : America, printed, unknown where, or by whom sold; London, re-printed for John Joseph Stockdale ...
notes: Film/Fiche is presented as originally captured.
